scripts.setup-gcp: node -e "if (process.env.GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_BASE64) { const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const keyContent = Buffer.from(process.env.GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_BASE64, 'base64').toString(); const keyPath = path.join(__dirname, 'service-account.json'); fs.writeFileSync(keyPath, keyContent); fs.chmodSync(keyPath, 0o400); console.log('‚úÖ Service account key created:', keyPath); } else { console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_BASE64 not found - running in mock mode'); }"
scripts.clean-gcp: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const keyPath = path.join(__dirname, 'service-account.json'); if (fs.existsSync(keyPath)) { fs.unlinkSync(keyPath); console.log('üóëÔ∏è  Removed service account key'); }"
